title: Set-Based Reasoning Workshop for Logical Principles and Conditional Proofs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic logic and set theory concepts, with mathematical reasoning experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing interactive and visual tools optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent the logical relationships of conditional statements through set-based modeling.
Learners can systematically derive proof structures by comparatively analyzing inclusion relationships between propositions.
Learners can complete conditional proof by applying set reasoning strategies to geometric/number-theoretic problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
